title: Can I switch themes of my phone or use live wallpapers?
answer:
You can switch themes and use live wallpapers on your phone. 


 Touch **Themes**. Four default themes are displayed. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45402) 


 Touch and hold in a blank area. On the **Set home screen** window, touch **Wallpaper** > **Home screen wall paper** > **Live wallpaper** 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45405)
